mapper.select: select g.typeName,p.* from PROCESSDEF p left join GlobalType g on g.typeId=p.globalTypeId where p.enabled=1 and p.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%') and p.globalTypeId=#{typeId} order by p.createDate desc

select g.typeName,p.* from PROCESSDEF p left join GlobalType g on g.typeId=p.globalTypeId where p.enabled=1 and p.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%') and p.globalTypeId=#{typeId} and p.actDefId is not null and (p.id in (select pu.processDefId from PROCESSDEF_USER pu where pu.userId=#{userId}) or p.id in (select pr.processDefId from PROCESSDEF_ROLE pr where pr.roleId in (#{roleIds})))

select count(*) from PROCESSDEF p left join GlobalType g on g.typeId=p.globalTypeId where p.enabled=1 and p.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}), '%') and p.globalTypeId=#{typeId} and p.actDefId is not null and (p.id in (select pu.processDefId from PROCESSDEF_USER pu where pu.userId=#{userId}) or p.id in (select pr.processDefId from PROCESSDEF_ROLE pr where pr.roleId in (#{roleIds})))
select f.* from PROCESSDEF f where f.enabled=1 and f.id=#{id}
select f.* from PROCESSDEF f where f.actDefId=#{actDefId} and f.enabled=1
select f.* from PROCESSDEF f where f.id=#{id} and f.enabled=1
select f.* from PROCESSDEF f where f.name=#{name} and f.enabled=1 and f.globalTypeId=#{typeId}
select f.id from PROCESSDEF f where f.name=#{name} and f.enabled=1 and f.globalTypeId=#{typeId}
select u.* from User u join PROCESSDEF_USER p on u.id=p.userId where p.processDefId=#{id}
select r.* from Role r join PROCESSDEF_ROLE p on r.id=p.roleId where p.processDefId=#{id}
select r.* from PROCESSDEF r join PROCESSDEF_ROLE p on r.id=p.processDefId where p.roleId=#{roleId}
mapper.update: update PROCESSDEF f set f.name=#{name} , f.globalTypeId=#{globalTypeId} , f.version=#{version} , f.actDefId=#{actDefId} , f.actResId=#{actResId} , f.graphResId=#{graphResId} , f.documentation=#{documentation} , f.enabled=#{enabled} , f.flowFormId=#{flowForm.id} , f.deployDate=#{deployDate} , f.suspended=#{suspended} , f.hasType=#{hasType,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler} , f.lastUpdateDate=#{lastUpdateDate} where f.id=#{id}
update PROCESSDEF u set u.enabled=0 where u.id=#{id}
